sourcesContent:
<template>
  <form>
    <textarea v-model="content" placeholder="Write a {{ isReply ? 'reply' : 'comment' }}..." :rows="3"></textarea>
    <button @click.prevent="submit">{{ isReply ? "Reply" : "Submit" }}</button>
    <button v-if="isReply" @click.prevent="cancel">Cancel</button>
  </form>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  props: {
    isReply: {
      type: Boolean,
      default: false
    }
  },
  data() {
    return {
      content: ""
    }
  },
  methods: {
    submit() {
      this.$emit("submit", this.content)
      this.content = ""
    },
    cancel() {
      this.$emit("cancel")
      this.content = ""
    }
  }
}
</script>
